targets.query: SELECT count("user") FROM "dovecot_auth_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "rip" LIMIT 10
SELECT count("value") as hits FROM "postfix_sasl_auth" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "sasl_username" ORDER BY hits DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT count("user") FROM "dovecot_auth_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "rip" LIMIT 10
